organization.name: Swaz Solutions
organization.description: Professional data recovery services in India with 98% success rate. AI-powered lyric generation and digital identity management solutions.

pages.title: Swaz Solutions - Data Recovery, AI Music & Digital Identity Services India
pages.summary: Professional data recovery services with 98% success rate across India. AI-powered Lyric Studio with 14-agent system for 23 languages. Modern digital identity management with vCard generation.

pages.title: Data Recovery Services India - 98% Success Rate
pages.summary: Professional data recovery for hard drives, SSDs, RAID arrays, and flash media. Free diagnostics within 4-6 hours. Fixed pricing. No data, no fee guarantee. 24/7 emergency service available.

pages.title: Hard Drive Data Recovery Services India
pages.summary: Mechanical and logical hard drive recovery with Class 100 cleanroom facility. Recovers from clicking drives, head crashes, motor failures, and firmware corruption. 98% success rate.

pages.title: SSD Data Recovery Services India
pages.summary: Professional SSD and flash memory recovery. Handles NAND flash failures, controller malfunctions, firmware corruption, and wear leveling issues. Specialized SSD recovery tools.

pages.title: RAID Array Recovery Services India
pages.summary: Enterprise RAID data recovery for RAID 0, 1, 5, 6, 10 arrays. Virtual destriping, multiple drive failure recovery, NAS/SAN recovery. Business-critical data restoration.

pages.title: Ransomware Recovery and Decryption Services India
pages.summary: Professional ransomware data recovery and encrypted file restoration. Backup recovery, decryption tools, shadow copy restoration. Emergency 24/7 service for business-critical situations.

pages.title: AI Lyric Studio - 14-Agent Multilingual Song Writing
pages.summary: Revolutionary AI lyric generation with 14 specialized agents. Supports 23 Indian languages with native script enforcement, cultural metaphor engines, and emotion analysis (Navarasa). Powered by Google Gemini 3.0.

pages.title: About Swaz Solutions - Digital Innovation Experts
pages.summary: Leading digital innovation platform providing data recovery services, AI-powered lyric generation, and digital identity management solutions across India. Based in Hyderabad with nationwide service.

pages.title: Contact Swaz Solutions - Data Recovery Services India
pages.summary: Contact Swaz Solutions for data recovery, AI lyric generation, or digital identity services. Phone: +91-9701087446. Email: support@swazsolutions.com. Serving all of India with 24/7 emergency support.
